title: Goop > Science, Knife Party! 1.29.20
itunes:title: Goop > Science, Knife Party! 1.29.20
description:
In episode 558, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Billy Wayne Davis to discuss the new Batman production, QAnon figuring out the cure for Coronavirus, more on what we have learned from John Bolton's book and the strife it's creating on the right, the Trump hotel, Kobe's last game, the new Goop Netflix show, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Production Begins on ‘The Batman’ as Director Matt Reeves Shares First Photo From the Set
  2. QAnon-ers’ Magic Cure for Coronavirus: Just Drink Bleach!
  3. Trump Tied Ukraine Aid to Inquiries He Sought, Bolton Book Says
  4. Lou Dobbs: "John Bolton himself has been reduced to a tool for the radical Dims and the Deep State"
  5. Tucker: John Bolton has always been a snake
  6. Trump Hotel Sale Has DC MAGA Groupies Scared About Losing Their Safe Space
  7. ESPN Re-Airing Kobe Bryant's Final Game, and Fans Are Tearing Up
  8. Gwyneth Paltrow Calls Goop’s $75 Vagina Candle ‘Punk Rock’ Because Words Mean Nothing
  9. Experts fact-check health claims in Netflix’s ‘The Goop Lab’
  10. Netflix’s Gwyneth Paltrow show is a gateway drug for the Goop circus
  11. What The Goop Lab gets right (and wrong) about sex
  12. Our crappy healthcare system is to blame for Goop
  13. WATCH: Puma Blue - Bruise Cruise

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
